document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffe05e">Good </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">night, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">because </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">we </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">must. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">How </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70b4ff">intricate </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffc04e">dust! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">would </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">go, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">know! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Oh </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c06cff">incognito! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70b4ff">Saucy, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70b4ff">Saucy </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff6c8e">Seraph </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">To </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70b4ff">elude </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">me </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">so! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffc04e">Father! </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">they </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70b4ff">wont </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">tell </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">me </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70b4ff">Wont </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">you </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">tell </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">them </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to? </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: "Good night," because we must!
